p: The PCR products were run in an ABI 3130XL Genetic Analyzer using GeneScan LIZ 500 as the internal size standard (Applied Biosystems). The AFLP E‐primers and the microsatellites primers paGT 4 and paGT 9 were Fam‐labeled, paGT 8, paGT 13, and Phra 93 were Pet‐labeled, and Phra125 was Vic‐labeled.
